title: Wholemeal Hot Cross Buns
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '300ml warm milk (45 C)', '2 eggs, beaten', '75g butter, softened', '475g wholemeal flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '75g currants', '85g mixed fruit peel', '5 tablespoons honey', '125g plain flour', '125g butter', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '2 tablespoons milk']
